# NSBitmapImageRep.FileType.bmp

**Case**

Windows bitmap image (BMP) format.

## Declaration

```swift
case bmp
```

## Constants

- **NSBitmapImageRep.FileType.tiff**: Tagged Image File Format (TIFF).
- **NSBitmapImageRep.FileType.gif**: Graphics Image Format (GIF), originally created by CompuServe for online downloads.
- **NSBitmapImageRep.FileType.jpeg**: JPEG format.
- **NSBitmapImageRep.FileType.png**: Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format.
- **NSBitmapImageRep.FileType.jpeg2000**: JPEG 2000 file format.
